name: 陳協慶
objective:
本課程之目的在訓練學生，使學生熟悉經常使用之統計方法與理論，能利用已知之資料整理、分析未知之現象，打好修習其他相關學科之基礎。課程內容包括：機率理論、推定、假設檢定、迴歸分析、變異數分析等。
The purpose of this course is to train students to familiarize themselves with the statistical methods and theories that are often used. They can use collected data to  analyze unknown phenomena and lay the foundation for other related disciplines. Course content includes: probability theory, inference, hypothesis testing, regression analysis, analysis of variance.
schedule:
(wk1) 抽樣分布 (Sampling and Sampling Distribution)
(wk2) t-, F-分布 (Sampling and Sampling Distribution)
(wk3) 平均值、標準差估計 (Interval Estimation)
(wk4) 信賴區間 (Interval Estimation)
(wk5) Quiz#1
(wk6,7) 單點估計，雙點估計 (Point Estimation)
(wk8,9) 單、雙樣本假設檢定  (Hypotheses Tests), 期中考
(wk10) 列聯表檢定(Comparison Multiple Proportions, Test of Independence and Goodness of Fit)
(wk11,12) 變異數分析 (Experimental Design and ANOVA)
(wk13) Quiz#2
(wk14,15) 線性迴歸分析與相關性分析 (Simple Linear Regression)
(wk16,17) 複迴歸與非線性迴歸統計軟體操作 (Multiple Regression)
(wk18) 期末考
materials: Statistics for Business & Economics, by Anderson, et al.
